SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ClubHtmlGenerator
Class that generates HTML content for a club based on an IClub instance.
IClub
Unified interface representing a football club and its management operations.
IEvent
Interface representing an event in a football match.
IEventManager
Interface defining the operations for storing and retrieving match events.
IExporter
Interface for exporting data.
IFormation
Interface representing a formation in a football team. for example 4-4-2, 3-5-2, etc.
IGoalEvent
Represents a goal event in a football match.
ILeague
Interface representing a league.
IMatch
Unified interface for managing a football match between two teams, including match events, statistics, teams, squads, and formations.
IPlayer
Interface representing a football player.
IPlayerPosition
Interface representing a player's position in a football team.
IPlayerSelector
Interface for selecting a player based on the club and position.
ISchedule
Interface representing a schedule of matches in a league.
ISeason
Interface representing and managing a league containing teams and matches.
IStanding
Interface for managing the standings of a football league.
ITeam
Interface for managing a team of players.
LeagueHtmlGenerator
Class that generates HTML content for a league based on a JSON file.
MatchHtmlGenerator
Class that generates HTML content for a match report.
MatchSimulatorStrategy
Interface for simulating a football match.
PreferredFoot
Enum representing the preferred foot of a player.
SeasonHtmlGenerator
Class that generates HTML content for a league season directly from an ISeason object.
